# This is a placeholder file
# 
# INSTRUCTIONS:
# 1. Download the CoreMS logo from: https://i.ibb.co/cXsYwrCh/core-ms-high-resolution-logo.png
# 2. Save it as 'app_icon.png' in this same folder (1024x1024 pixels recommended)
# 3. Run: flutter pub get
# 4. Run: flutter pub run flutter_launcher_icons
# 5. Run: flutter clean && flutter run
#
# The icon will be automatically generated for all screen densities.
